page.title: 08WILDLIFE ON THE ESTATE 1
page.content: This is a project on{wildlife}in our area. We went to Abercairney Estate to interview the{gamekeeper. An important aspect of his work is {breeding}game birds for shooting. These include{pheasants, partridges, {geese, ducks,}and{capercaillie.} He has at least 8,000 of these game birds available for shooting parties each year. He also{shoots deer}to keep the number down, as they destroy the plant life and crops on the estate. Another role as gamekeeper is to {protect}these valuable{animals}from predators, such as foxes, stoats, weasels, crows, buzzards, falcons, and sometimes eagles.
